metadata.synopsis: One liner in which Nightsong is caged in Lorroakan's Soul Cage
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with nightsong in the cage after defeating her in ramazith's tower, having lorroakan survive and have a long rest.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Dame Aylin will not meet your gaze.*
0.context: NodeContext: She's just watched the love of her life (Isobel) be killed in front of her. This is true agony, from the depths of her soul.

1.speaker: Nightsong
1.text: ISOBEL! ISOBEL! Why did you bring her here?! What have you done?!
1.context: NodeContext: She's just watched the love of her life (Isobel) be killed in front of her. This is true agony, from the depths of her soul.

10.speaker: Nightsong
10.text: WHEN I AM FREE, I WILL DESTROY YOU! I WILL MURDER YOU, AND YOUR CHILDREN, AND THEIR CHILDREN BESIDE!
10.context: NodeContext: She's just watched the love of her life (Isobel) be killed in front of her. This is true agony, from the depths of her soul.

6.speaker: Nightsong
6.text: I will rip this world apart, plank and beam, until every iota of your being is scalded by my light. This is my promise. This is my vow.
6.context: NodeContext: She's just watched the love of her life (Isobel) be killed in front of her. This is true agony, from the depths of her soul.

2.speaker: Nightsong
2.text: Do not tell Isobel what fate has befallen Dame Aylin. She must not enter this viper's den.
2.context: NodeContext: Staring at the ground. Full of disappointment, deep pain, hatred, but steadying herself.

8.speaker: Nightsong
8.text: You stood to gain from my undoing. I know your reasons, fetid though they are. But Isobel...
8.context: NodeContext: Staring at the ground. Full of disappointment, deep pain, hatred, but steadying herself.

9.speaker: Nightsong
9.text: ...Isobel deserves to live. Please - do not harm a hair on her blessèd head.
9.context: NodeContext: Looks up at the player, staring in their eyes

5.speaker: Nightsong
5.text: May the Moonmaiden have mercy on your soul.

3.speaker: Nightsong
3.text: I am sorry for you. You who have no honour. You who have no pride.
3.context: NodeContext: Staring directly at the player, full of defiance, hatred

4.speaker: Nightsong
4.text: When next we meet, no words will cross Dame Aylin's lips, but her sword will find your flesh and make of it her sheath.
4.context: NodeContext: Staring directly at the player, full of defiance, hatred

7.speaker: Nightsong
7.text: May the Moonmaiden have mercy on your soul.
7.context: NodeContext: Staring directly at the player, full of defiance, hatred
